subject: From today--yeah, manual
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Kinda noisy, and the old RS digital recorder does not cut off the internal
mic when recording from and external mic, so I can ask and get answered.
They never used to answer Qs.

F-S

Kinda noisy, and he old RS digi al eco de does no cu o he in e nal mic when eco ding om and ex e nal mic, so I can ask and ge answe ed. They ne e used o answe Qs.
 
F-S
